__e: And in the throes of love, I was weak and no match for her.
You have the power to destroy him, ...to make him suffer again the agonies of hell.
You insist on describing the torments of love when you clearly know nothing about them.
There ain't nothing up there but pain and suffering on a scale you can't even imagine.
I think it's time that they pay the bill for all the pain and suffering that they've caused. Right? That's right.
I was this close to perfecting the procedure, you can't possibly fathom that kind of torture. To have this knowledge, this power, and know there's nothing more you can do about it.
If we, you and I, got together, it would all disappear in toil and strife.
